1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Unicode general categories.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Base.Text.Unicode
6  ( MajorGeneralCategory (..),
7    majorGeneralCategory,
8    toMajorGeneralCategory,
9    generalCategoryName,
10    generalCategoryLetter,
11    generalCategoryMajorLetter,
12    generalCategoryMinorLetter,
13  ) where
14
15import qualified Data.Char as Ch
16
17-- | Major category of the Unicode general categories.
18data MajorGeneralCategory
19    = UnicodeLetter          -- ^ Lu Ll Lt Lm Lo
20    | UnicodeMark            -- ^ Mn Mc Me
21    | UnicodeNumber          -- ^ Nd Nl No
22    | UnicodePunctuation     -- ^ Pc Pd Ps Pe Pi Pf Po
23    | UnicodeSymbol          -- ^ Sm Sc Sk So
24    | UnicodeSeperator       -- ^ Zs Zl Zp
25    | UnicodeOther           -- ^ Cc Cf Cs Co Cn
26      deriving (Show, Eq, Ord, Bounded)
27
28-- | Major general category of character.
29majorGeneralCategory :: Char -> MajorGeneralCategory
30majorGeneralCategory = toMajorGeneralCategory . Ch.generalCategory
31
32-- | Convert general category to major category.
33toMajorGeneralCategory :: Ch.GeneralCategory -> MajorGeneralCategory
34toMajorGeneralCategory Ch.UppercaseLetter        = UnicodeLetter
35toMajorGeneralCategory Ch.LowercaseLetter        = UnicodeLetter
36toMajorGeneralCategory Ch.TitlecaseLetter        = UnicodeLetter
37toMajorGeneralCategory Ch.ModifierLetter         = UnicodeLetter
38toMajorGeneralCategory Ch.OtherLetter            = UnicodeLetter
39
40toMajorGeneralCategory Ch.NonSpacingMark         = UnicodeMark
41toMajorGeneralCategory Ch.SpacingCombiningMark   = UnicodeMark
42toMajorGeneralCategory Ch.EnclosingMark          = UnicodeMark
43
44toMajorGeneralCategory Ch.DecimalNumber          = UnicodeNumber
45toMajorGeneralCategory Ch.LetterNumber           = UnicodeNumber
46toMajorGeneralCategory Ch.OtherNumber            = UnicodeNumber
47
48toMajorGeneralCategory Ch.ConnectorPunctuation   = UnicodePunctuation
49toMajorGeneralCategory Ch.DashPunctuation        = UnicodePunctuation
50toMajorGeneralCategory Ch.OpenPunctuation        = UnicodePunctuation
51toMajorGeneralCategory Ch.ClosePunctuation       = UnicodePunctuation
52toMajorGeneralCategory Ch.InitialQuote           = UnicodePunctuation
53toMajorGeneralCategory Ch.FinalQuote             = UnicodePunctuation
54toMajorGeneralCategory Ch.OtherPunctuation       = UnicodePunctuation
55
56toMajorGeneralCategory Ch.MathSymbol             = UnicodeSymbol
57toMajorGeneralCategory Ch.CurrencySymbol         = UnicodeSymbol
58toMajorGeneralCategory Ch.ModifierSymbol         = UnicodeSymbol
59toMajorGeneralCategory Ch.OtherSymbol            = UnicodeSymbol
60
61toMajorGeneralCategory Ch.Space                  = UnicodeSeperator
62toMajorGeneralCategory Ch.LineSeparator          = UnicodeSeperator
63toMajorGeneralCategory Ch.ParagraphSeparator     = UnicodeSeperator
64
65toMajorGeneralCategory Ch.Control                = UnicodeOther
66toMajorGeneralCategory Ch.Format                 = UnicodeOther
67toMajorGeneralCategory Ch.Surrogate              = UnicodeOther
68toMajorGeneralCategory Ch.PrivateUse             = UnicodeOther
69toMajorGeneralCategory Ch.NotAssigned            = UnicodeOther
70
71
72-- --------------------------------------------  Name
73
74-- | Name of general category.
75--   This function returns one of @letter@, @mark@,
76--   @number@, @punct@, @symbol@, @sep@, or @other@.
77generalCategoryName :: MajorGeneralCategory -> String
78generalCategoryName UnicodeLetter         = "letter"
79generalCategoryName UnicodeMark           = "mark"
80generalCategoryName UnicodeNumber         = "number"
81generalCategoryName UnicodePunctuation    = "punct"
82generalCategoryName UnicodeSymbol         = "symbol"
83generalCategoryName UnicodeSeperator      = "sep"
84generalCategoryName UnicodeOther          = "other"
85
86-- | Major-minor category symbols like @Lu@.
87generalCategoryLetter :: Ch.GeneralCategory -> String
88generalCategoryLetter cat =
89    [ generalCategoryMajorLetter $ toMajorGeneralCategory cat
90    , generalCategoryMinorLetter cat]
91
92-- | One-letter representation of general category.
93--   This function returns one of @L@ (letter),
94--   @M@ (mark), @N@ (number), @P@ (punctuation),
95--   @S@ (symbol), @Z@ (seperator), or @C@ (other).
96generalCategoryMajorLetter :: MajorGeneralCategory -> Char
97generalCategoryMajorLetter UnicodeLetter             = 'L'
98generalCategoryMajorLetter UnicodeMark               = 'M'
99generalCategoryMajorLetter UnicodeNumber             = 'N'
100generalCategoryMajorLetter UnicodePunctuation        = 'P'
101generalCategoryMajorLetter UnicodeSymbol             = 'S'
102generalCategoryMajorLetter UnicodeSeperator          = 'Z'
103generalCategoryMajorLetter UnicodeOther              = 'C'
104
105-- | One-letter representation of minor general category.
106generalCategoryMinorLetter :: Ch.GeneralCategory -> Char
107generalCategoryMinorLetter Ch.UppercaseLetter        = 'u'
108generalCategoryMinorLetter Ch.LowercaseLetter        = 'l'
109generalCategoryMinorLetter Ch.TitlecaseLetter        = 't'
110generalCategoryMinorLetter Ch.ModifierLetter         = 'm'
111generalCategoryMinorLetter Ch.OtherLetter            = 'o'
112
113generalCategoryMinorLetter Ch.NonSpacingMark         = 'n'
114generalCategoryMinorLetter Ch.SpacingCombiningMark   = 's'
115generalCategoryMinorLetter Ch.EnclosingMark          = 'e'
116
117generalCategoryMinorLetter Ch.DecimalNumber          = 'd'
118generalCategoryMinorLetter Ch.LetterNumber           = 'l'
119generalCategoryMinorLetter Ch.OtherNumber            = 'o'
120
121generalCategoryMinorLetter Ch.ConnectorPunctuation   = 'c'
122generalCategoryMinorLetter Ch.DashPunctuation        = 'd'
123generalCategoryMinorLetter Ch.OpenPunctuation        = 's'
124generalCategoryMinorLetter Ch.ClosePunctuation       = 'e'
125generalCategoryMinorLetter Ch.InitialQuote           = 'i'
126generalCategoryMinorLetter Ch.FinalQuote             = 'f'
127generalCategoryMinorLetter Ch.OtherPunctuation       = 'o'
128
129generalCategoryMinorLetter Ch.MathSymbol             = 'm'
130generalCategoryMinorLetter Ch.CurrencySymbol         = 'c'
131generalCategoryMinorLetter Ch.ModifierSymbol         = 'k'
132generalCategoryMinorLetter Ch.OtherSymbol            = 'o'
133
134generalCategoryMinorLetter Ch.Space                  = 's'
135generalCategoryMinorLetter Ch.LineSeparator          = 'l'
136generalCategoryMinorLetter Ch.ParagraphSeparator     = 'p'
137
138generalCategoryMinorLetter Ch.Control                = 'c'
139generalCategoryMinorLetter Ch.Format                 = 'f'
140generalCategoryMinorLetter Ch.Surrogate              = 's'
141generalCategoryMinorLetter Ch.PrivateUse             = 'o'
142generalCategoryMinorLetter Ch.NotAssigned            = 'n'
143
